alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hardee and north central DeSoto Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ona, or 12 miles southwest of Wauchula, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ona, Sweetwater, Limestone, Gardner, and Brownville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
